description:
AJKI-08 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Ivory

Discover the serene beauty of this ivory ensemble, where the shirt is a canvas of embroidery art adorned with threadwork in cherry red, pink, and green hues, accented by sparkling light gold sequins. The shawl, featuring an all-over embroidered pattern with beautifully crafted pallu borders, envelops you in tranquility and elegance, making it a perfect choice for those who seek to embody grace in winter.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered front side panel left on self twill
Embroidered front side panel right on self twill
30” embroidered border for front daman on self twill
30” embroidered back with border on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on self twill
2.5-meter embroidered shawl with 2-side border on self twill
2 embroidered pallu borders for shawl on self twill
1.5-meter wide-width self twill for trouser
